From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: The **configureÂ overwrite-network** has been replaced by the **copy** {*ftp-url* | *rcp-url* | *tftp-url*} **nvram:startup-config** command. See the description of the **copy** command in the **"Cisco IOS File System Commands"** chapter for more information.
CLIs: The configure overwrite-network has been replaced by the copy { <ftp-url> | <rcp-url> | <tftp-url> } nvram:startup-config command. See the description of the copy command in the "Cisco IOS File System Commands" chapter for more information.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.
